description:
Soft breezy Ts are what sunny days are made for. Sporting a tropical graphic and made from a comfy fabric with sustainability in mind.Contains recycled polyester, preferred Lyocell and organic cotton.Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort.Tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that 10 trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content









                      Preferred Lyocell














                      Recycled content
name: tentree Tropical Ten T-Shirt - Women's
